name: example-api-project
description: Example project for API testing using AVA, typescript and superagent
author: Oleksii Ihnatiuk

scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run jsonserver:up
scripts.test: npm run ava && npm run aftertest || npm run aftertest
scripts.aftertest: npm run clean && npm run jsonserver:down
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run tsc
